definition: Xinwu or Hsinwu township in Taoyuan county 桃園縣|桃园县[Tao2 yuan2 xian4], north Taiwan
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
Xinwu or Hsinwu township in Taoyuan county 桃園縣|桃园县[Tao2 yuan2 xian4], north Taiwan

sentences.english: The workers torn down the old house and built a new one in its place.
sentences.chinese: 工人们拆毁旧屋，并在原址上另盖新屋。

sentences.english: In the same month new-home sales plunged to a 12-month low.
sentences.chinese: 同月的新屋销售率跌到12个月以来的低点。

sentences.english: (Foreigners are allowed to invest in new Australian dwellings - a rule designed to stimulate housing construction).
sentences.chinese: 但为了刺激住宅建设，外国人可在澳投建新屋。

sentences.english: Instead of buying an expensive new home, we decided to buy an older home amd fix it up ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 我们决定买一间中古屋来自己装修，以取代买的新屋。

sentences.english: The family rebuilt their cabin and built another house with the wood that the man had cut.
sentences.chinese: 一家人用他砍得的木头重建了小屋井建了一座新屋。

sentences.english: He junked all his old furniture before moving into his new home.
sentences.chinese: 他在搬入新屋之前，把旧的家具当作废物全丢掉了。

sentences.english: The new house of hoping has set up, the wishes of the childhood years recall.
sentences.chinese: 盼望的新屋已建成，儿时的启盼成回忆。

sentences.english: The workers tore down the old house and built a new one in its place.
sentences.chinese: 工人们拆毁旧屋，并在原地另盖新屋。

sentences.english: Sales of new homes declined in May to a record low as a tax credit expired.
sentences.chinese: 由于税收信贷过期，5月新屋销售跌幅创历史新低。

sentences.english: The new house belongs to Mr Li.

definition: house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)
residence consisting of structures surrounding a courtyard on three sides
a building of two or more stories/CL:棟|栋[dong4],幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
central room of a traditional Chinese house
